review: Good game, combined best aspects of great ARPGs, d1 2 tl1 2 van helsing1, and with a few new ones of its own. Will be enjoying this one while it grows :)
fun game, people complain about RNG but really who cares, maybe you have to give the level a couple more goes, try something different, eventually you'll beat it.
